```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
##開啟「ETF4_2000_2018_d.txt」檔案，代碼顯示為正確及fileEncoding = "UTF-8-BOM"。
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
etf4<-read.table("ETF4_2000_2018_d.txt", header = T, fileEncoding = "UTF-8-BOM")
head(etf4)
```
##設定stringsAsFactors = T, 讓其以證券代碼、id、date、price分類。
```{r}
etf4.csv<-read.csv("ETF4_2000_2018_d.csv", stringsAsFactors = T,  fileEncoding='big5', colClasses = c("證券代碼"="character",'id', 'date', 'price'))
head(etf4.csv)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
etf4_csv<-read_csv("ETF4_2000_2018_d.csv", locale = locale(encoding='big5'))
head(etf4_csv)
str(etf4_csv)
```
